responses: Which branch are you calling from? I usually go to the one near the main market.
I updated my KYC last month at the Dispur branch! Why is it asking again?
Sir, will my ATM card stop working today? I need to withdraw money for groceries.
My grandson told me never to click links, can you just do it from your computer?
I have accounts in two banks, are you calling for the savings one or the pension one?
Is the YONO app down? It's just showing a white screen on my phone.
Wait, I am looking for my PAN card. Itâ€™s in the cupboard... hold on.
Does the bank manager know you are calling me? His name is Baruah, right?
Can I come to the branch tomorrow morning instead of doing this on phone?
I am opening the link now... wait, it says 'Connection not private'. Is that okay?
Is this about the 5000 rupees I deposited yesterday?
Oh no! My pension comes tomorrow. Please don't block the account!
I'm typing my name. Should it be in capital letters or small letters?
The battery of my phone is 4%. If it switches off, will you call me back?
My neighbor said her account was also blocked. Is there a virus in the bank?
But I paid the bill at the Bijulee Bhawan office last Monday!
Will my fridge get spoiled if you cut the power? I just bought fish today!
Is this APDCL? Why is the message coming from a private mobile number?
I have a smart meter installed. Does it still require manual update?
Wait, my husband handles the bills. Can you talk to him? He is in the market.
I don't have the consumer number right now. Can you find it using my name?
Is there a discount if I pay the pending amount immediately?
The light just flickered! Did you already cut the power?
Can I pay via cash at the local sub-station tomorrow?
I have the receipt right here. The transaction ID is... wait, the ink is faded.
Why is the bill so high this month? Last month it was only 800 rupees!
If I pay through the app, how long will it take to update your system?
My mother is on an oxygen concentrator! Please don't cut the power!
Is there an official helpline number I can call to verify this?
Can you send the technician to my house? I will pay him directly.
Is there a registration fee? My friend told me some jobs ask for money first.
Do I need a laptop or will you provide one for the work?
How many hours a day do I need to work? I am a student at Gauhati University.
Is this a permanent job or a contract basis role?
Will I get a joining letter on company letterhead?
Can I do this work from my mobile phone? I don't have a computer.
Is the salary paid weekly or monthly? And is it in bank or cash?
I saw a similar post on Instagram. Are you from the same company?
Do I need to come to the office for the interview or is it on Zoom?
I am very interested! What is the first task I need to complete?
Will there be a training period? And will I get paid for training?
Is this about the data entry work or the YouTube liking work?
I don't have a Telegram account. Can we talk on WhatsApp instead?
My father says I should check the company's GST number. Do you have it?
Can I refer my friends also? They are also looking for work.
One second, my phone is hanging. I think it needs a restart.
Wait, someone is at the door. Let me see who it is first.
The internet is very slow in my room. Let me go to the balcony.
I am looking for my glasses. I can't read the small numbers on the screen.
My phone is on 1% charge! Let me find the charger... where is it...
Wait, my cat just jumped on the table and spilled water!
I am getting a call from my daughter. Let me decline it and talk to you.
The keyboard is not appearing on the screen. Let me try again.
I am opening the SMS. Oh, I have so many messages, which one is yours?
Hold on, I need to put the phone on speaker so I can type and talk.
